thread.section_title: AmericanFlags.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AmericanFlags.com | americanflags.com | 4 of 191
thread.title: julie blaeser

author: julie blaeser
title: julie blaeser
text: My drama/comedy masks Mardi Gras flag is beautiful! I was able to track my purchase with updates provided, and it arrived within days. It was folded to pocket-size, but ironed out beautifully, and has remained wrinkle-free while it blows and waves every day since it arrived. I am definitely purchasing a new American flag for our upcoming patriotic holidays. Our previous one has been properly retired, and we were looking for an economical replacement. Prices are VERY competitive here! I am a happy customer!
